sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.UIActionUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>UIActionUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var UIActionUtils = Class.create();

UIActionUtils.prototype = {
  initialize : function() {
  },

  approvalsNoLongerRequired : function(sysId) {
	if (JSUtil.notNil(sysId)) {
		var approve = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
		approve.addQuery('sysapproval', sysId);
		approve.addQuery('state', 'requested').addOrCondition('state', 'not requested');
		approve.query();
		while(approve.next()) {
			approve.state = 'not_required';
			approve.update();
		}
	}
  }
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2008-12-18 01:12:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>47a41ccd0a0a0b0c008694bbbe65741e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UIActionUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Upgrade content for Winter 2009 - activated only for new instances" source="upgrade.2009_winter_content">77c2414f6d6620100acb70b3534330f1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_47a41ccd0a0a0b0c008694bbbe65741e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>russ.sarbora</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-04-08 18:29:27</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>504</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
